story_teamrocket_01_04000/2401_1201_0200: Huh? Oh no! He was just here a minute ago!
story_teamrocket_01_04000/2401_1201_0500:
Wh-what can we do? Should we try to retrace
our steps?
story_teamrocket_01_04000/2401_1201_0600: That’s what I’d like to do, but...
story_teamrocket_01_04000/2401_1201_0700:
If we turn around, they’ll get us from the back.
We’ve only got one option, and that’s to keep on
pushing forward!
story_teamrocket_01_04000/2401_1201_0800:
Paulo will probably do the same...which means
we can meet up with him further in!
story_teamrocket_01_04000/2401_1201_0900: OK! I’ll give this everything I’ve got!
